meanings.definition: A tool with a straight edge used for drawing straight lines.
meanings.sent1: I used a straightedge to draw a perfect line on my paper.
meanings.sent2: The architect always carries a straightedge in his bag for precise drawings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous student tried to use the straightedge as a ruler for measuring.
meanings.sent4: Her precision was like a straightedge, cutting through the chaos of the project.
meanings.sent5: The sharp straightedge left a clean mark on the paper.

meanings.definition: A person who abstains from drugs, alcohol, and promiscuous sex.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a straightedge and never drinks or smokes.
meanings.sent2: The straightedge community promotes a healthy lifestyle free from harmful substances.
meanings.sent3: At the party, everyone was surprised to meet a real straightedge.
meanings.sent4: She stood out in the crowd like a straightedge in a world of curves.
meanings.sent5: Being a straightedge means making choices that prioritize well-being.
